description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Randomly generated stealth action! Crawl, sneak and run past robot guards in a-near infinite number of levels! Customize the game and level generation in Custom Mode!
description.short: Randomly generated stealth action! Crawl, sneak and run past robot guards in a-near infinite number of levels! Customize the game and level generation in Custom Mode!
